# WEAPON::GET_MAX_RANGE_OF_CURRENT_PED_WEAPON

## Summary
Gets the maximum lock-on range of the current ped weapon (returns -1.0f if not found or invalid weapon)

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped

## Returns
* **FLOAT**
